definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: (? = [[מִשְׁעִית]] cf. Thes Sm) cleansing, only ´[[לאׁ רֻחַחְתְּ לְמ]] Ez Eze 16:4 thou wast not washed for cleansing (cf. Targum Thes and Add:98 Sm RV al.; Vulgate ad salutem, as if from [[ישׁע]]; LXX om., and so Co Be SS, cf. Buhl; form strange, and word at best dub.)
